business.headline: Elon Musk gets even richer after wealth hits all-time high post Trump winThe jump in Elon Musk's fortune came after Tesla shares rose 3.8% on Friday, reaching a 3.5-year closing high of $352.56 per share.

Jeff Bezos denies Musk's claim on Tesla stock advice: '100% not true'Elon Musk said on social media platform X that Bezos had advised people to sell their Tesla and SpaceX shares, predicting Donald Trump's electoral defeat.

Byju's founder told US ally to flee the US to avoid testifying: ReportThe businessman, William R. Hailer, testified before US Bankruptcy Judge John T. Dorsey, alleging that Byju Raveendran offered him a lucrative job and sent him a $10,700 plane ticket to Dubai just two days before he was scheduled to testify.

Sensex ends nearly 2,000 points higher, Nifty above 23,900A broad-based recovery in information technology (IT), financial, banking and energy stocks spearheaded the recovery. A sharp rebound in Adani Group stocks also added to the positive momentum.
Sensex surges 2,000 points, Rs 7 lakh crore added: 4 key factors behind rallyThe Sensex was up 2039.44 points to 79,195.23 at 2:57 pm, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 587.90  to 23,938.75.

Bitcoin hits record high, within touching distance of $100,000 milestoneThe world's leading cryptocurrency topped $99,300, coming within striking distance of the psychological milestone that many experts had anticipated after the US election results.

Sensex jumps 1,200 points: 3 things to know about today's stock market bull runThe BSE Sensex climbed 1,193.90 points to cross 78,340.07, while the NSE Nifty advanced 371.50 points to reach 23,721.40.

Sensex jumps over 1,000 points as most Adani Group stocks rebound sharplyStock market today: The S&P BSE Sensex climbed 1,034.76 points to 78,190.55 by 12:42 pm, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 329.15 points to reach 23,679.05.

Adani Group accused of racial discrimination at Australian coal mining unitAdani Bribery Case: The Nagana Yarrbayn Wangan & Jagalingou Cultural Custodians in Queensland state filed a complaint alleging serious racial discrimination by Bravus Mining and Resources, an Adani Group unit.

Adani bribery case: S&P lowers outlook on 3 Adani units, raises funding concernsGautam Adani Case: S&P expressed concerns that the accusations could erode investor confidence, impair funding access, and escalate borrowing costs for the group.

Zinka Logistics makes tepid market debut: Should investors hold or exit?Zinka Logistics listing: Shares listed at Rs 280.90 on the National Stock Exchange (NSE), a 2.89% premium to the issue price of Rs 273. On the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE), the stock opened at Rs 279.05, reflecting a 2.22% premium.

Ola Electric layoffs: 500 employees likely to lose jobs amid restructuringOla Electric Layoffs News: The move aims to streamline operations, eliminate redundant roles, and enhance profitability. The restructuring process, which began months ago, is expected to conclude by December 2024.

Gold, silver price today, November 22, 2024: Precious metals record hike on MCXGold Price Today: Both gold and silver are trading on the higher side of the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) on Friday. Check the latest city-wise prices here.

Adani Group stocks extend slide amid bribery charges. Details hereAdani Group stocks: This marks the second consecutive session of heavy losses for the conglomerate, with Thursday's rout wiping out Rs 2.25 lakh crore from the group's market capitalisation.

How Sagar Adani's 'bribe notes' unravelled $250 million schemeAdani Bribery Case: At the heart of the complex bribery scheme for which Gautam Adani and his associates have been indicted are the industrialist's nephew Sagar Adani and the detailed "bribe notes" he kept on his mobile phone.

Paytm shares jump 3% today after brokerage Bernstein's update. Should you buy?Paytm share price: With shares up 34% this year and 136% in six months, Paytm's growth potential continues to attract investor interest, although challenges remain.
Sensex, Nifty bounce back; Adani Energy shares down 5%Stock Market Today: The S&P BSE Sensex was up 496.10 points to 77,651.89, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 72.25 points to 23,422.15

Adani Enterprises, Adani Green, Airtel, LTI, JSW, Zinka: Stocks to watch todayBroader market indices also faced selling pressure, with volatility surging across sectors. As trading opens today, several stocks are expected to remain in focus due to recent developments.
Kenya cancels $700 million deal with Adani Group after US chargesKenya has terminated a $700 million agreement with the Adani Group following a US indictment.

Kenya cancels $730 million proposed deals with Adani Group after US indictmentKenyan President William Ruto has ordered the cancellation of several proposed deals with the Adani Group after the US indicted industrialist Gautam Adani in a bribery case.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: Called gaddar, Shinde settles Sena vs Sena debate with gadarAs the Maharashtra Assembly election results poured in, Eknath Shinde was seen to have settled the Sena vs Sena debate by winning 56 of the 81 seats it contested. The strike rate of his Sena was 69% while that of the faction led by Uddhav Thackeray was 24%. Dubbed a gaddar, Shinde settled the debate with a gadar (mayhem).

1st Test Day 2 Live: Jaiswal, KL Rahul fifties drive India towards huge leadAUS vs IND, 1st Test Day 2 Live Updates and Reactions: Yashasvi Jaiswal and KL Rahul are extending India's lead with some terrific batting in the second innings. Both batters have looked at ease as the Australians have struggled to make any breakthrough despite using six bowlers, including Marnus Labuschagne. Jaiswal and KL have completed their fifties and have secured a 100-plus-run opening partnership.

Kuchh toh gadbad hai: Team Uddhav after MVA hammered in MaharashtraEarly trends show the Mahayuti alliance leading in 221 seats, leaving the opposition Maha Vikas Aghadi (MVA) trailing far behind with a lead in just 52 seats.

Live: With 4 lakh-vote lead, Priyanka Gandhi set to overtake brother Rahul's win marginWayanad election result live: The by-election in Wayanad was held on November 13, 2024. In the Wayanad bypolls, Priyanka Gandhi Vadra is leading with 4,81,689 votes, while her rival Sathyan Mokeri has secured 1,62,490 votes. This gives Priyanka Gandhi a lead of 3,19,199 votes as the race continues. Both candidates focused on development and grassroots initiatives, appealing to rural and urban voters. The Wayanad election has drawn attention for its potential impact on the region's political landscape. Follow India Today for the latest updates regarding Wayanad bypolls.

Actor Swara Bhasker's husband Fahad Ahmad, trailing, blames EVMs with 99% chargeAnushakti Nagar results: Fahad, who is trailing by 3,300 votes, has demanded a recount after accusing the BJP of manipulating the result

Bypolls live: BJP leading in 6 of Uttar Pradesh's 9 seats, Akhilesh's Samajwadi wins 1ByPolls Election Results 2024 Live: The counting of votes for the bypolls to 46 Assembly seats in 13 states, a crucial electoral exercise since the parliamentary polls in April-May. Samajwadi Party's Naseem Solanki won while the BJP leads in six Uttar Pradesh bypolls seats.

The Assembly bypolls were held in nine seats in Uttar Pradesh, seven seats in Rajasthan, six seats in West Bengal, five seats in Assam, four seats each in Punjab and Bihar, three seats in Karnataka, two seats each in Madhya Pradesh and Kerala and one seat each in Chhattisgarh, Gujarat, Uttarakhand and Meghalaya.

The Meerapur, Kundarki, Sisamau, Katehari, Phulpur, Majhawan, Ghaziabad, Karhal and Khair seats went to bypolls in the crucial political battleground of Uttar Pradesh on November 20. While the results will not directly impact the composition of the 403-member state Assembly, the contest is being seen as the first major face-off between the ruling Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) and its political rivals since the Lok Sabha election.

The BJP and the opposition parties have accused each other of election malpractices.

India takes a massive lead Down Under, INDIA down in the dumpsMaharashtra election results: While the Indian cricket team, after batting first on a greenish Perth pitch, is on course to take a massive lead against Australia, the other INDIA is down in the dumps on a fragmented Maharashtra pitch.

LIVE: Mahayuti set for landslide win in Maharashtra, ahead in over 220 seats Maharashtra Assembly Election Results 2024 Live: The Mahayuti alliance, comprising the BJP, Shiv Sena, and NCP, is set for a landslide victory in Maharashtra. All alliance partners have showcased an impressive performance, according to the trends, with their lead crossing over 200 out of the 288 seats. Meanwhile, the Maha Vikas Aghadi (MVA), which includes the Congress, Shiv Sena (UBT), and NCP (SP), is limited to just around 50-60 seats, marking a massive setback. The exit polls had predicted a close fight with a slight edge for the Mahayuti. However, the current trends indicate a resounding victory for the NDA. Stay tuned to IndiaToday.in for the latest results and updates as the counting progresses in Maharashtra.

Navjot Sidhu's wife beat cancer with 'strict diet': Can diet alone aid recovery?Navjot Singh Sidhu revealed that his wife is now cancer-free as she followed a strict diet during and after her treatment. Experts, however, warn that diet alone is insufficient for cancer recovery.

Yoda Diagnostics Launches 'Beat the Diabetes' Campaign to Raise Awareness and Promote Personalized Diabetes CareEmpowering Personalized Diabetes Care: Yoda Diagnostics' 'Beat the Diabetes' Campaign Promotes Genetic-Based Medication Plans

Yeh Kaali Kaali Ankhein 2 review: Tahir Raj Bhasin is brilliant in thrilling seriesReleased-Fri Nov 22, 2024Yeh Kaali Kaali Ankhein 2, a sequel to the popular series, continues the thrilling narrative with new twists and challenges for its characters. The show keeps viewers engaged with its intense storyline and strong performances, particularly by Tahir Raj Bhasin.

Worli LIVE: Aaditya Thackeray wins Worli after tight contest with Milind DeoraWorli Assembly Election Results 2024 Live: Worli witnesses a three-way contest between Chief Minister Eknath Shinde-led Shiv Sena's Rajya Sabha MP Milind Deora, Shiv Sena (UBT)'s Aaditya Thackeray, and Maharashtra Navnirman Sena (MNS) candidate Sandeep Deshpande. Mahayuti candidate Deora, who quit the Congress and joined the Shinde Sena earlier this year, is hopeful of wresting the seat from MVA's Aaditya Thackeray, the son of Uddhav Thackeray and the current MLA from Worli. MNS's Deshpande is also optimistic about a surprise in this high-profile seat. Stay tuned to India Today as we bring you all the latest updates from Worli as the Maharashtra Assembly election counting progresses.

AUS vs IND: Yashasvi Jaiswal breaks Gautam Gambhir's 16-year-old recordYashasvi Jaiswal has broken Gautam Gambhir's 16-year-old record for the most runs by an Indian left-handed batter in a calendar year. His composed innings in the Perth Test has put India in a strong position.

Scale of NDA's Maharashtra win: BJP tally alone double that of INDIA's in leadsMaharashtra election results: While the Mahayuti is leading in over 200 seats, the BJP, which fielded 149 candidates, is ahead in 125. On the other hand, the opposition Maha Vikas Aghadi (MVA) is leading in only 60 seats.

With 103 votes, Bigg Boss fame Ajaz Khan trails even NOTA in Versova Fielded by Chandrashekhar Azad's Azad Samaj Party (Kanshi Ram), Ajaz Khan failed to translate his social media popularity - a staggering 5.6 million Instagram followers - into votes.

Palakkad bypolls: Congress's Rahul Mamkootathil wins by over 18,000 votes Palakkad Election Result 2024: Congress candidate Rahul Mamkootahil won Kerala's Palakkad Assembly bypoll, defeating BJP's C Krishnakumar by over 18,840 votes, while CPI(M)-backed P Sarin finished third.

Watch: Hina Khan breaks down as Salman mentions her cancer battle on Bigg Boss 18Hina Khan appeared in the latest Bigg Boss 18 Weekend Ka Vaar episode with Salman Khan. The two spoke about her journey on the show and her ongoing battle with cancer, which made her teary-eyed on the stage. Check out the new promo inside.
Question Time: Weekly News QuizThink you read the headlines this week? Let's test that!

Elon Musk gets even richer after wealth hits all-time high post Trump winThe jump in Elon Musk's fortune came after Tesla shares rose 3.8% on Friday, reaching a 3.5-year closing high of $352.56 per share.

Adani row: What the Azure whistleblowers flagged in the alleged bribery scandalFormer Azure executives, along with business tycoon Gautam Adani, have been named in unsealed court documents by the US Attorney for the Eastern District of New York and the FBI.

Mere Karan Arjun aayenge: But, will they be welcomed by Gen Z?The re-release of the iconic film Karan Arjun has generated excitement with both millennials and Gen Z eager to witness the legendary duo of Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan on the big screen once more. With its unforgettable dialogues and timeless appeal, the film continues to captivate audiences across generations.

Thank you, ladli behena, kisan: Eknath Shinde after NDA landslide in MaharashtraElection Commission trends show Mahayuti is leading in 218 seats in the 288-member Assembly, with the opposition Maha Vikas Aghadi (MVA) trailing far behind with a lead in 56 seats.

What's behind the rise of pre-draped sarees in IndiaWearing a saree no longer demands the patience to carefully wrap it around your body, create precise pleats, and perfectly drape the pallu before stepping out to slay - thanks to the advent of pre-draped sarees.

Huge protests in Montreal amid Nato meet, cars burnt, Netanyahu effigy set ablazeThe protests unfolded as NATO delegates convened in the city for a high-level summit. At least four people were arrested in connection with the violence so far.

Watch promo: Allu Arjun-Sreeleela set to sizzle in Kissik song from Pushpa 2Allu Arjun and Sreeleela are set to take over the screens with their scintillating chemistry in the new song from Pushpa 2: The Rule, titled Kissik. The promo of the song was released on Saturday, while the grand launch is going to take place on Sunday, November 24.

Watch: Amaran star Sivakarthikeyan credits Yash for Kannada cinema success with KGFActor Sivakarthikeyan opened up on 'admiring' Kannada actor Yash for his 'remarkable' contribution to the Kannada film industry. The Amaran actor was speaking during a special session at IFFI Goa 2024.

Bulleya singer Amit Mishra marries Kriti Thakur in LucknowSinger Amit Mishra got married to Kriti Mahendra Singh Thakur in Lucknow on November 22. The wedding was a grand affair with friends and family in attendance.

KBC 16: Abhishek Bachchan says Big B is 'atrocious' at playing dumb charadesIn a light-hearted moment during the recent KBC 16 episode, Abhishek Bachchan humorously revealed Big B's struggles with dumb charades. Abhishek came to the show for the promotion of his latest film, I Want To Talk.

sports.headline: Let Rahul continue opening, Rohit can bat in middle order: Ex-pacerAUS vs IND: Dodda Ganesh said that India should not disturb their opening combination of KL Rahul and Yashasvi Jaiswal when Rohit Sharma returns to play in the ongoing Border-Gavaskar Trophy.

AUS vs IND: Yashasvi Jaiswal scores composed fifty in maiden Australia TestYashasvi Jaiswal gave India control in the Perth Test with a composed fifty on Saturday, November 23. Jaiswal got to his fifty in 123 balls as the southpaw made amends for his 1st innings failure.

Rahul-Yashasvi 1st Indian opening pair since 2004 to stitch 100-run stand in AustraliaIndian openers Yashasvi Jaiswal and KL Rahul scripted history to become the first Indian opening pair in two decades to record a century stand in Test cricket in Australia.

Pant's stump-mic chat during Starc-Hazlewood stand goes viral: Dum lagana padegaIndia wicketkeeper Rishabh Pant made sure that his teammates did not lose morale in the opening Test match in Perth. Pant was heard yelling for Indian fielders to get up and stay sharp when the team was getting frustrated by Mitchell Starc and Josh Hazlewood's partnership.

Yashasvi Jaiswal sledges Mitchell Starc in Perth: You are coming too slow at meYashasvi Jaiswal engaged in playful banter with Aussie pacer Mitchell Starc during the Perth Test on Saturday, November 23. The young Indian batter showed confidence after a challenging first innings.

AUS vs IND: Yashasvi Jaiswal breaks Gautam Gambhir's 16-year-old recordYashasvi Jaiswal has broken Gautam Gambhir's 16-year-old record for the most runs by an Indian left-handed batter in a calendar year. His composed innings in the Perth Test has put India in a strong position.

Tahlia McGrath to lead Australia side in women's ODI vs India in Healy's absenceVeteran all-rounder Tahlia McGrath will lead the Australian women's side against India in regular skipper Alyssa Healy's absence in the three-match ODI series next month.

Tilak Varma scripts T20 world record with mammoth 151Hyderabad captain Tilak Varma scripted history by becoming the first batter to score three consecutive T20 centuries. The 22-year-old's record-breaking spree culminated in a jaw-dropping 151 off just 67 balls in Hyderabad's Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy opener.

Gavaskar calls out fake blog post about Bumrah, Kohli, threatens legal actionLegendary Sunil Gavaskar has threatened legal action against a website for publishing a blog under his name. The website in question had published an article titled 'A New Era in Leadership: Bumrah's Captaincy and Kohli's Leadership Revive Team India' under Gavaskar's name.

When Australian tail frustrated India: Usual suspect Starc solid in PerthMitchell Starc frustrated Indian bowlers with a gritty 26 off 112 balls, supported by Josh Hazlewood's unbeaten 7, as Australia reached 104 on day two of the Perth Test. Their crucial 25-run last-wicket stand reduced India's lead to 46.

Anushka Sharma in attendance in Perth, cheers for Kohli on action-packed Day 2India vs Australia: Bollywood actress Anushka Sharma was in attendance in the stands on Saturday, enthusiastically cheering for her husband, Virat Kohli, during the action-packed Day 2 of the Perth Test. The star-studded moment delighted fans as photos and videos of Anushka's presence quickly went viral on social media.

I bowl faster than you: Starc, Harshit's on-field banter on Day 2 of Perth TestBorder-Gavaskar Trophy: Mitchell Starc and Harshit Rana were involved in on-field banter on Day 2 of the ongoing Perth Test where the Australia great reminded the India debutant that he bowls faster than him.

Jasprit Bumrah runs riot vs Australia with 11th 5-wicket-haul in TestsIndia captain Jasprit Bumrah continued to run riot against Australia on Saturday, 23 November. With the wicket of Alex Carey, Bumrah completed his 11th five-wicket haul in Test cricket. This was also Bumrah's 2nd 5-wicket-haul vs Australia.

UAE bowler under scanner for huge no-ballUAE cricketer Hazrat Bilal found himself at the centre of controversy during the Abu Dhabi T10 League after delivering a massive no-ball in Samp Army's match against the New York Strikers. Murali Vijay hails 'cool and calm' Nitish Kumar Reddy after impressive Test debutFormer India cricketer Murali Vijay hailed all rounder Nitish Kumar Reddy for his impressive Test debut on Day 1 of the first Test against Australia in Perth.

Watch: Amid intense IPL auction planning, Dravid keeps track of Perth Test scoresIndia's former head coach Rahul Dravid, now leading Rajasthan Royals in the IPL, showcased his enduring passion for Indian cricket as he keenly followed the national side's stunning Day 1 comeback in the Perth Test against Australia.

AUS vs IND: Perth witnesses 17 wickets on Day 1, most since 1952 in AustraliaThe day 1 of the first Test between India and Australia at the Optus Stadium in Perth witnessed 17 wickets falling in a day as Australia finished on 67/7 at stumps in reply to India's first innings score of 150.

'Bumrah gave India the perfect start': Pujara praises pacer's Perth captaincyIndia batter Cheteshwar Pujara heaped praise on Jasprit Bumrah for his sensational 4/17 spell, which turned the tide for India on Day 1 of the Perth Test. Bumrah's captaincy and bowling brilliance inspired a remarkable fightback after a batting collapse.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
